channel.title: slice on 晒春风的博客 - 春风十里不如你 - Ten miles of spring breeze is not as good as you
channel.description: Recent content in slice on 晒春风的博客 - 春风十里不如你 - Ten miles of spring breeze is not as good as you

item.title: Slice 具体使用
item.description: 删除Slice的一个元素 1 2 3 func remove(slice []int, index int) []int { return append(slice[:index], slice[index+1:]...) } 清空Slice的所有元素 1 2 3 func remove(slice []int) []int { return slice[:0] }
